name: YATBBH
description:
--- Yet Another Turn Based Bullet Hell!

In YATBBH you have the simple goal of directing Mr Robot from the start to the
goal square. Avoiding the bullets along the way, of course.

Each turn you may move up, down, left, right or stand still.

Tips:
  - Don't forget you can stand still!
  - The cannons display two pieces of information about their firing patterns:
    i)  each cannon may spin clockwise, counter clockwise or not at all, with an
        icon on top showing which,
    ii) each cannon has a firing schedule, displayed as a series of pink or blue
        lights. blue indicates turns on which the cannon fires, and pink shows
        turns where the cannon does not fire. the currently lit light indicates what
        will happen next turn.

Controls: keyboard
  - Move left/right/etc --- arrow keys
  - Stay still          --- space bar
  - Undo move           --- z
  - Reset               --- r
  - Show solution       --- s
  - Pause/menu          --- escape
  Controls: game pad
  - Move          --- D-pad/left axis/right axis
  - Stay still    --- A
  - Undo move     --- B
  - Reset         --- Y
  - Show solution --- X
  - Pause/menu    --- start/select

Source available at: github.com/jf89/ld41
